document.full_text: the u.s. education department has sent the final version of a controversial rule aimed at reining in low-quality trade schools and colleges to the white house budget office for review, an agency spokeswoman said on tuesday.
document.title: for-profit education rule heads for final u.s. review
lines_and_colors: the u.s. education department has sent the final version of a controversial rule aimed at reining in low-quality trade schools and colleges to the white house budget office for review, an agency spokeswoman said on tuesday.
